name: In re Nomination Petition of Michael J. CAVANAGH, Republican Candidate for Representative in the General Assembly from the 51st District. In re Nomination Petition of Michael J. Cavanagh, as a Republican Candidate for State Representative in the 51st District
name_abbreviation: In re Nomination Petition of Cavanagh

judges: CASTILLE, C.J., SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY, ORIE MELVIN, JJ.
parties: In re Nomination Petition of Michael J. CAVANAGH, Republican Candidate for Representative in the General Assembly from the 51st District. In re Nomination Petition of Michael J. Cavanagh, as a Republican Candidate for State Representative in the 51st District.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of April, 2012, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Ronald James Brown, Grogan Graffam, P.C., for Thomas R. Murray, II and Robin Lynn Amend.
Lawrence M. Otter, Harrisburg, for appellees Robert Smith and Bill Hubbard.
casebody.head_matter:
44 A.3d 651
In re Nomination Petition of Michael J. CAVANAGH, Republican Candidate for Representative in the General Assembly from the 51st District. In re Nomination Petition of Michael J. Cavanagh, as a Republican Candidate for State Representative in the 51st District.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted March 26, 2012.
Decided April 4, 2012.
Michael J. Cavanagh, Pro Se.
Ronald James Brown, Grogan Graffam, P.C., for Thomas R. Murray, II and Robin Lynn Amend.
Lawrence M. Otter, Harrisburg, for appellees Robert Smith and Bill Hubbard.
CASTILLE, C.J., SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY, ORIE MELVIN, JJ.
